thread.title: Cristina Garro
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Cristina Garro

author: Cristina Garro
title: Cristina Garro
text:
We had a great experience working with Anthony our Sales Rep. He always followed through. Our product arrived earlier then expected and was amazing. We already used our Mop Topper Screen Cleaner with Stylus Pens in a conference and they were a HIT!
Thank you Quality Logo Products!
From the ONEder Team
